name: Nature Gaze
description:
Hiii I'm Nate Churman and I made Nature Gaze.
A game where you can shape all the land as you desire.
Because all I want is freedom for the player.
You can edit any texture, sound or even game property.
A game maker made into a game basically.

With a minimalistic futuristic approach.
For example there is absolutely no HUD. So wheres the healthbar? Well thats actually your screen resolution. You die when its just one pixel.

Theres no inventory either, you just carry one item. (Which can be stolen from you) But you can befriend other creatures and build an army. Your family is kinda like your inventory.
It's a new kind of survival.

All this design and engine coding has taken me two years, yet it still aint complete.
So I decided to sell it in beta but kinda cheap.
Temporary price of 12 and not 24 dollars.
With free updates forever of course.

I'll forever update because Nature Gaze is the meaning of my life.
Even if this doesn't sell well, I havent failed, because this is my personal paradise.
